title: The Anthony Cumia Show 2015-04-07 Ralph Sutton Payton Sin Claire
description:
*** CAUTION: 100% UNCENSORED CONTENT!!! ***

-NOT FOR VIEWING BY CHILDREN OR THE FAINT OF HEART-

Fresh off his "separation" from SiriusXM, Anthony Cumia, formerly of The Opie and Anthony Show launches his live, uncensored HD video webcast at AnthonyCumia.com Monday-Thursday 4pm-6pm EST. Current events, politics, news and anything can and will be discussed with celebrity guests and comedians stopping by as well. This show is not for those who are inclined to be "politically correct" and will contain boundary-pushing language and topics. Proceed with caution...

Guest(s): Ralph Sutton, Payton Sin Claire

Episode 141 - Human garbage Anthony starts Tuesday addressing Opie's statements including the haters, being a bad friend, Opie's wedding, the houses of friends he's been to, his drinking, resentment, therapy, missing work, race talk, not "liking each other" and moving on. With that out of the way, we find out that "Chinky Almond Eyes" has won the "Most Offensive Song" contest, Ant relocates to the poker table to sit with adult entertainer Payton Sin Claire and Ralph Sutton from The SDR Show to talk about the movies that Payton has done, she then strips down to nada, Ralph talks about the upcoming "Motorhead Motorboat Cruise", his radio show, and making the switch from radio to on-line. Payton tells the guys where she draws the line sexually, they discuss horse cock, Chatroulette, Ant pitches the possibility of having cam girls, Peyton shows off her piercing, and attempts to fuck, ummm, Greggshells. We get the backstory on Ralph, hear about his travels, learn Peyton doesn't like big words, and they wrap up chatting about ass play, relationships, and Listerine-o'clock.


Includes an MP4 video file and an MP3 audio file; download both or only what you need and please seed!
